org.drip.analytics.daycount
Class DayCountBasis

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.daycount.DayCountBasis

public class DayCountBasis
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains flags that indicate where the holidays are loaded from, as well as the holiday types and load rules

                                        double dblEnd,

                                        double dblMaturity,
                                        ActActDCParams actactParams,
                                        java.lang.String strCalendar)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the accrual fraction in years between 2 given days for the given day count convention and the other parameters

Parameters:
dblStart - Start Date
dblEnd - End Date
strDayCount - Day count convention
bApplyEOMAdj - Apply end-of-month adjustment (true)
dblMaturity - Maturity Date
actactParams - ActActParams
strCalendar - Holiday Calendar
Returns:
Accrual Fraction in years
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the accrual fraction cannot be calculated

Rolls the given date in accordance with the roll mode and the calendar set

Parameters:
dblDate - Date to be rolled
iRollMode - Roll Mode (one of DR_ACT, DR_FOLL, DR_MOD_FOLL, DR_PREV, or DR_MOD_PREV
strCalendarSet - Calendar Set to calculate the holidays by
Returns:
The rolled date
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the date cannot be rolled
